channel.title: Posts on Google Net Browse Helper
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Google Net Browse Helper

item.title: 如何反馈问题
item.description: 一 进入issues 页面 点击 New issues 创建新问题 二 或者你也可以发送邮件到 nodelrd@gmail.com

item.title: 如何安装使用
item.description: 从 Releases页面下载最新版本 vxxxx.zip，并且解压 浏览器地址栏输入 : chrome://extensions/ 并 打开 打开开发者模式 点击"加载已解压的扩展程",选中刚才解压出来的 vxxxxx 目录 完成

item.title: privacy policy
item.description: privacy policy We are very delighted that you have shown interest in our enterprise. Data protection is of a particularly high priority for the management of the Nodessl. The use of the Internet pages of the Nodessl is possible without any indication of personal data; however, if a data subject wants to use services via our website, processing of personal data could become necessary. If the processing of personal data is necessary and there is no statutory basis for such processing, we generally obtain consent from the data subject.
